name: Alduq_Besene
content:
Alduq Besene was a male Human who lived in Mos Eisley on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. He worked as an artisan for Jabba the Hutt and was always looking for new talent. In 1 ABY, he paid a spacer to create a number of tools, to test the spacer's ability.
Alduq Besene was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Alduq Besene was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 17", on May 26, 2005. He used to be a specialized trainer providing a quest to the beginner players who had chosen a career of "artisan". The "artisan" profession was later removed from the game upon the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005,
